snippet: Six years after Barbaro won the Kentucky Derby, then fractured an ankle in the Preakness and died eight months later, Michael Matz has a new contender in Union Rags.
abstract: Michael Matz, who trained 2006 Kentucky Derby winner Barbaro, is shooting for another Derby victory with new contender Union Rags.
lead_paragraph: Six years after Barbaro won the Kentucky Derby, then fractured an ankle in the Preakness and died eight months later, Michael Matz has a new contender in Union Rags.

headline.seo: Michael Matz, Barbaro’s Trainer, Hoping for a Second Derby Win
headline.main: Barbaro’s Trainer Hoping for a Second Derby Win
headline.print_headline: Barbaro’s Trainer Going For Second Derby Win
